titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 440) to provide for the conveyance of lands to certain individuals in Butte County, California.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-14, by Mr. Linder.
Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 440 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 9.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/31/1995--Introduced. Sets forth the open rule for the consideration of H.R. 440 (conveying lands to certain individuals in Butte County, California).
